product_name: The North Face  Kilowatt Quarter-Zip Top - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Kilowatt Quarter-Zip Top for men uses FlashDry-XDTM fabric to speed dry time and features abrasion-resistant overlays for durability.
short_description: A technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Kilowatt Quarter-Zip Top for men uses FlashDry-XDTM fabric to speed dry time and features abrasion-resistant overlays for durability.
